name: microFantasy
description:
Art from https://0x72.itch.io/microfantasy
Some edits were made to give it more variety but the majority of the art is from that pack. I saw the little examples 0x72 gave and got inspired to make something with it. At some point I might release a separate game with art entirely done by me, but no plans as of now.

Controls:

  • arrow keys to move
  • ctrl to attack
  • up / down to climb and descend ladders
  • up to enter doors

List of changes:

  • added bg color to some tiles to remove gaps
  • added wood tiles and some variations to the stone tiles
  • added climbing animation to basic character
  • particle effects
  • coins
  • GUI features
  • spriteText
